title: Faux-leather coat with fur collar
schema_description: This garment is part of our party and event collection, designed to elevate your looks for special occasions. Crafted from leather-effect fabric, this long and straight design features a V-neck with a lapel and detachable fur. It has long sleeves, belt loops, a buckle-fastening belt, two side pockets, and a front button closure. Available in Plus Size
material: Composition: 100% polyester, Lining: 100% polyester, Hair: 100% polyester, Belt: 100% polyester, Coating: 100% polyurethane, Belt covering: 100% polyurethane
